instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: HWT 4BAT/6/40000005 error
threads.message: Anyone knows what this issue is? When I test customers Mac all working fine but he said before it rebooted and show a cross instead of percentage "no battery" after SMC and PRAM worked again. After that randomly shuts down. Anyidea?

threads.title: HWT 4BAT/6/40000005 error
threads.message: Probabily a dodgy battery or even SMC data lines, crud under SMC. need more info.
